About Me

I am a small business entrepreneur addicted to coding and looking to put my passion to meaningful use. I have a Ph.D. in Management Information Systems and earned certificates in full-stack web development and data analysis & visualization from UCLA and USC bootcamps respectively. A self-starter and cheerleader at heart, I bring strong statistical, problem-solving and team-building skills, as well as reliability and determination to see projects through completion. My other interests include real estate, interior design, long-distance running, scuba-diving, skiing, meditation, yoga, playing the piano and traveling.
Bilingual French-English, fluent in Spanish.

I specialize in

Full-Stack Web Development, Data Analysis, Machine Learning, Data Visualization.

Front-End

I use my knowledge and experience with HTML, CSS, Sass, Bootstrap, JavaScript, React, Redux, Context APIs, RESTful APIs and Photoshop to design and build attractive websites for an enjoyable user experience.

Back-End

I create and maintain the technology at the back of a website, including writing web services and APIs, handling data storage, security and compliance, and managing hosting environments.
I code with Python, JavaScript and SQL, and work with Node.js, Express.js on the server side and PostgresQL, MySQL, and MongoDB for the database management system.

Data Analysis

Using my research, statistical, and coding skills, I manipulate large data sets, and create algorithms and predictive models to identify trends and develop insights.
I typically code with Python, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, SQL, and communicate my results with custom-built visualizations using d3.js or Tableau.
